channel.title: Darkarts on Phil Pearl's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Darkarts on Phil Pearl's Blog

item.title: Dumb ways to die: Random Values in Pointers
item.description: I seem to be writing about one blog post a year at the moment. I always tell myself I want to write more, but it doesn’t happen. This, however, is the first post in a series. But I only have two ideas for posts, and one seems like a bad idea, so it could be a short series! Every now and again I visit the Go slack, in particular the #performance channel and the #darkarts channel.
